feed.title: Category: Getsu Fuuma Den | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Getsu Fuuma Den (NES, 1987)
entry.content: This is another game that I got with my Famicom for free. This is a very intriguing game. It feels like a mix of the original Castlevania games with the multiple area/free-form system of Order of Ecclesia. After playing it for about 30 minutes, I put down in my database that I'd like to try it again. The mechanics are strong enough, although there seem to be a bit too many annoying sinusoidal enemies. We'll see.
